strings: <voice_0x010010F0><se_high>Carrie: All right! Fine! I guess I'll round up some bodyguards from the mansion, then.

<voice_0x010010F1><se_high>Carrie: I cannot believe you chose him over me.
Your loss.
<voice_0x010010F3><se_high>*: You rang, miss?
<voice_0x010010F2><se_high>*: You rang, master?
<voice_0x010010F4><se_high>Carrie: Prepare a feast for our guests tonight!

<voice_0x010010F5><se_high>Carrie: They look starved.
The least we can do is give them a meal to prepare for the big day tomorrow. Right?

<voice_0x010010F6><se_def>Cash: Carrie, are you actually being considerate?
This is a first!
<voice_0x010010F7><se_def>Cash: Well, we'll be on traveller's rations until we're back from the trial. I guess a banquet isn't a bad way to begin the journey!

<voice_0x01001109><se_def>Cash: Fair enough.
I'll take some of our men as bodyguards.
And before I forget...
<voice_0x0100110A><se_def>Cash: Would you be so kind as to prepare a nice dinner for our guests tonight?
<voice_0x0100110B><se_def>Cash: We should do our best to put them on equal footing with the guards, don't you think?

<voice_0x0100110C><se_high>Carrie: Do you always have to be so patronising, Cash!?
But you won't hear me complaining about having a nice dinner!
<se_low>Yangus: This ain't a bad deal, eh!? We ain't 'ad decent grub like this since Ascantha!

<voice_0x010010F8><se_low>Yangus: Diamond! First Ascantha an' now this!
We're on a banquet roll!
<voice_0x010010F9><se_def>Angelo: King Trode's going to miss out again, though.
<voice_0x010010FA><se_low>Yangus: Well, wot 'e don't know won't 'urt 'im!

That evening, the members of the party eat their
fill of the delicious banquet laid out for them,
and then fall into a deep, contented sleep...
<voice_0x010010FB><se_def>Cash: Wake up! Wake up!

<voice_0x010010FC><se_def>Cash: Wake up, <hero>!
How long are you planning to stay in bed!?
It's already after noon!

<voice_0x010010FD><se_def>Cash: Finally! You're awake!
It's after noon! My sister has already left!
<voice_0x010010FE><se_def>Cash: Help me wake up the others!
<voice_0x0100110D><se_high>Carrie: Wake up! Wake up!

<voice_0x0100110E><se_high>Carrie: Hello, <hero>!?
Wake up! Up! C'mon, MOVE, you lazy bum!

<voice_0x0100110F><se_high>Carrie: What are you doing!?
The sun's already up!
Cash is on his way to the cave!

<voice_0x01001110><se_high>Carrie: I can NOT believe this!
Help me wake everyone up, RIGHT NOW!
<voice_0x010010FF><se_low>Yangus: Yah-phew... Yah-phew...
<voice_0x01001100><se_def>Angelo: (Mumble, mumble...)
<voice_0x01001101><se_high>Jessica: Zzzz...
<voice_0x01001102><se_def>Cash: Wake up!

<voice_0x01001103><se_def>Cash: Snap out of it!
I hired you as guards! Remember!?

<voice_0x01001104><se_def>Cash: I've decided to let you off this time,
because I overslept, too.
We have my sister to thank for that.
<voice_0x01001105><se_def>Cash: The maid confessed that she put sleeping powder in our food last night. At Carrie's order.

<voice_0x01001106><se_def>Cash: No time to waste discussing it now.
We can still catch up. Come on!
Let's go to the Dragon Graveyard!

<voice_0x01001107><se_def>Cash: I know you need to get yourselves ready,
but I can't just sit around and wait for you!
<voice_0x01001108><se_def>Cash: I'll go on ahead. Meet me at the entrance to the Dragon Graveyard!
<voice_0x01001111><se_high>Carrie: Come on! Get up! NOW!
<voice_0x01001112><se_high>Carrie: I've decided to let it go this time, because I overslept, too. We have my jerk of a brother to thank for that.
<voice_0x01001113><se_high>Carrie: I got the maid to confess that she put sleeping powder in our food last night. At Cash's order!

<voice_0x01001114><se_high>Carrie: Look, there isn't any time to discuss it now.
We can still catch up with him. Come on!
Let's go!

<voice_0x01001115><se_high>Carrie: I know you need to get yourselves ready,
but I HATE waiting around!
<voice_0x01001116><se_high>Carrie: So I'm going on ahead. Meet me at the entrance to the Dragon Graveyard.
<voice_0x01001117><se_high>Carrie: And DON'T keep me waiting!
